name: Universes Everywhere: Yugioh — Protagonist and Rivals

cards.rules_text: When Yugi Moto enters, create a green 5/4 Wizard creature token named Dark Magician
When Seto Kaiba enters, create a green 6/5 Dragon creature token named Blue-Eyes White Dragon
cards.flavor_text: [i]“If I had a dime for every time you said ‘destiny', I'd be even richer!”[/i]

cards.card_name: Jaden Yuki, Hero of Two Worlds
cards.rules_text: When Jaden Yuki enters, create a green 4/3 Human creature token with “Whenever a creature dealt damage by this creature this turn dies, this creature deals damage equal to the destroyed creature's power to target player” named Flame Wingman.
When Chazz Princeton enters, create three green 0/2 Beast creature tokens named Ojama
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The Chazz is gonna make you go bye bye!”[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Yusei Fudo enters, create a green 5/4 Dragon creature token with “When this creature is destroyed by a card effect, exile target Yusei Fudo, Satellite Prodigy you control or in your graveyard, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control” named Stardust Dragon.

cards.card_name: Jack Atlas, the Master of Faster
cards.rules_text: When Jack Atlas enters, create a green 6/4 Dragon creature token with “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, destroy all tapped creatures that player controls” named Red Dragon Archfiend.

When Yuma Tsukumo enters, create a green 5/4 Human creature token with “When this creature enters, put two overlay counters on it. Remove an overlay counter from this card: Target creature deals no combat damage this turn.” named Number 39 Utopia.

When Reginald Kastle enters, create a green 6/4 Shark creature tokens with “When this creature enters, put three overlay counters on it. Whenever a creature dealt damage by this creature this turn dies, you may remove an overlay counter and return that creature to the battlefield under your control with a -2/-0 counter on it.” named Number 32 Shark Drake.

{T}: Add {G}
{5}, {T}: Return target creature from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only as a sorcery.
At the beginning of your upkeep, search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I believe in the heart of the cards”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Cast this spell only if you control three or more creatures.
Creatures you control get +X/+0 where X is the number of creatures you control until end of turn.
Target creature you control fights up to X target creatures.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“My grandpa's deck has no pathetic cards”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Sacrifice two creatures you control. Choose a creature you own that is outside the game, put that creature onto the battlefield. Exile Polymerization.
When this creature is destroyed by a card effect, exile target Yusei Fudo, Satellite Prodigy you control or in your graveyard, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control
Whenever a creature dealt damage by this creature this turn dies, this creature deals damage equal to the destroyed creature's power to target player.

When this creature enters, put three overlay counters on it. Whenever a creature dealt damage by this creature this turn dies, you may remove an overlay counter and return that creature to the battlefield under your control with a -2/-0 counter.
When this creature enters, put two overlay counters on it. Remove an overlay counter from this card: Target creature deals no combat damage this turn.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, destroy all tapped creatures that player controls.
This deck uses small creatures to play big powerful tokens when they enter. These tokens are often just big creatures, but some of them have very tricky effects to throw your opponent off.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]This deck uses your third unchosen Jumpstart deck.
This deck has a token deck.
Designed by David Keane[/i]
